page.title: 16 EMPLOYMENT
page.content: There are 27 children in our class and these are the jobs our parents do.Some parents have more than one job. Unemployed------------------ 2 dads Building Trade-------------- 8 people Nursing--------------------- 8 people Factory Workers------------- 8 people Hotel or Guest House-------- 5 people Shop Assistants------------- 4 people Full Time Housewives-------- 4 mums Farmers or Farm Workers----- 3 people Dinner Ladies--------------- 3 mums Cleaners-------------------- 2 mums Pop Group------------------- 2 people Clergyman------------------- 1 person Swimming Pool Attendant----- 1 person Hairdresser----------------- 1 person Voluntary Dog Walker-------- 1 person Tattooist------------------- 1 person Service Engineer------------ 1 person Lorry Driver---------------- 1 person Gardener-------------------- 1 person
